name: The visitors (CalixJumio)
description:
This is a prototype I made for GBJAM 5, sadly couldn't finish it.

The idea was to create a game where you rally people but without combat, just think about the last game you played in which the objective isn't to kill stuff. Maybe one day I'll be back to it and add the emotions to the visitors, and actions for the character, but for now it'll be as a lil cute demo.
